scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:umd && npm run bundle:umd:min
scripts.bundle:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/brandy-lifecycles.js
scripts.bundle:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/brandy-lifecycles.min.js
scripts.test: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --reporter dot --ui bdd tests/**/*.tests.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run bundle && npm run lint && npm run test
